content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Plate Factory at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 2.0)

### Electricity Generator at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam Engine (not specified)
- Boiler (not specified)
- Offshore Pump (not specified)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to insufficient resources for crafting
- Ensure you have the necessary ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it.

### Errors related to entity status
- Check the status of entities such as furnaces to ensure they have the required ingredients and fuel before expecting them to operate.
